creditline: Collection of David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description:
[K-05]

in a wooden box with inscription on outside and inside of lid; wrapped in tissue; porcelain roller; support fabric is light blue with cream and gold accents; image of a branch in black ink that angles down diagonally from upper right side to lower left side; inscription down L side with a round red chop at the bottom
title: Plum Branch
